job_tasks.phrase: Lead collaborations on virtual production, motion artistry, and AI to explore, develop, and establish new production capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes leading the development and establishment of new capabilities, which involves integrating different technologies (AI, 3D, motion) into production processes, aligning with the definition of developing and integrating software/capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the development of lean processes and automation solutions across the studio, optimizing workflows, reducing costs, and ensuring high quality for customer-facing solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing and optimizing processes and automation, which are core software engineering tasks aimed at improving efficiency and quality of solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Support the integration of new production workflows, tools, and standards.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to integrating new workflows, tools, and standards, which is a key aspect of software development and integration into existing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a role that connects different teams to understand needs and improve processes, indicating an understanding of business context and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with trends in the media landscape, including GenAI, 3D, and motion production, and explore new innovations to enhance customer communication and production processes.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding industry trends and exploring innovations to improve business processes, aligning with business understanding and strategic thinking.

soft_skills.phrase: Lead collaborations on virtual production, motion artistry, and AI to explore, develop, and establish new production capabilities.
Act as a bridge between project teams and production to gather insights and improve capabilities.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on leading the integration of AI, 3D, and motion production innovations to streamline workflows and develop new capabilities. The tasks described fall primarily under 'Software Development & Integration' (Macro-Category A), such as leading collaborations, driving development of processes and automation, and supporting integration of workflows and tools. While AI and GenAI are mentioned as areas of focus, the core responsibilities are about integrating these technologies into production processes and optimizing workflows, rather than developing AI models themselves. There is no mention of specific AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it involves building and maintaining software/processes that utilize AI as a core component.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to integrating AI and optimizing production processes. While it mentions AI and GenAI, it doesn't delve into the specifics of AI model development or deep AI specialization. The tasks are predominantly focused on the engineering and integration aspects of applying these technologies within a production environment. The confidence is high because the tasks align well with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile, but not a perfect 5 due to the broadness of terms like 'AI' and 'GenAI' without further context on their specific application within the role.
